qas.question: Where are face masks required in finland?

answers.text: The Finnish authorities recommend the use of face masks when travelling on public transport and in other situations where maintaining safe distances is not possible

paragraphs.context: The Finnish authorities recommend the use of face masks when travelling on public transport and in other situations where maintaining safe distances is not possible.

qas.question: Does finland accept proof of covid vaccination ?

answers.text: Finland will accept proof of COVID-19 vaccination record

qas.question: How old must by print covid vaccine certification be in finland?

paragraphs.context: The coronavirus situation around Finland can vary widely, so local advice should be followed. Finland will accept proof of COVID-19 vaccination record. If you are travelling with a printed PDF proof of vaccination status, it must date from 1 November to ensure that the certificate can be scanned successfully, if domestic certification is required.
